file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 28-11-05-06 - FUEL FILLER CAP SEAL - INSPECTION/CHECK

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL FUEL FILLER CAP SEAL - INSPECTION/CHECK EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to do the inspection of the fuel filler cap seal. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ALL 28-11-05-200-801-A FUEL FILLER CAP SEAL - INSPECTION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 28-11-05 Page 1 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 28-11-05-200-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. FUEL FILLER CAP SEAL - INSPECTION A. General (1) This task permits you to examine the condition of the seal of the fuel filler cap. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 28-00-00/200 - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Ladder To get access to the wing top 1 available F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Wing top surface I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A WARNING: BEFORE YOU DO THE TASK, OBEY THE SAFETY PRECAUTIONS GIVEN IN AMM MPP 28-00-00/200 TO PREVENT INJURY TO PERSONS AND DAMAGE TO THE MATERIAL. (1) Put the ladder in the work area. J. Inspect Fuel Filler Cap (Figure 601) SUBTASK 212-002-A (1) Remove the fuel filler cap and examine the seal for general condition. If necessary, replace or repair as required. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 28-11-05 Page 2 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Remove the ladder. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 28-11-05 Page 3 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
